title: Tyshawn Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description: Tyshawn Jones is the epitome of city style and his signature shoe is the embodiment of that drive, swagger and edge. With nods to his New York roots and court culture, the Tyshawn signature shoes are constructed with premium materials, cupsole support, a flexible midsole wrap and a high-grade EVA midsole to provide the durability, stability, comfort and control for modern skateboarding.

title: 4DFWD Pulse 2 Shoes
subtitle: Women's Running
description: Run smooth with these adidas shoes, created using state-of-the-art 3D printing technology, with incredible smoothness, guiding your strides for a more fluid run. The 4DFWD heel is angled to increase impact absorption. Working together with the EVA midsole, this unique design translates into a smooth heel transition at the moment of touchdown while the 3 layered upper is engineered for seamless stretchable support for lateral and linear movements. A rubber outsole provides superb traction for a confident stride. Made in part with recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Lace closure; Engineered mesh upper; Textile lining; 3D-printed 4DFWD midsole; Imported; Product color: Magic Mauve / Zero Metalic / Ecru Tint; Product code: GY1649
colors: Off White / Zero Metalic / Bliss Orange

title: Tour360 22 Golf Shoes
subtitle: Men's Golf
description: Take your performance to the next level in these adidas golf shoes. They're made with a BOOST midsole for energy return and enhanced comfort. The 360Wrap design locks in and supports your feet through 18 holes and beyond. An INSITE® sockliner offers cushioning for optimal fit and balance, and the SPIKEMORE traction outsole provides solid grip throughout your entire round.

title: The Gravel Cycling Shoes
subtitle: Cycling
description: The Gravel Shoe is the latest addition to the adidas Cycling family. Designed from the ground up to bring road performance and city styling to new territory, as you explore off-road. Featuring a recessed 2-bolt SPD cleat compatible outsole with TPU pods allow for easy walking off the bike and a lightweight, stiff construction to ensure power transfer to adventure further. Reinforced ripstop upper material is used for added protection and an internal sock helps to keep debris out of the shoe for all day comfort.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Reinforced synthetic upper with 3-Stripes; Roomy forefoot; Two-bolt cleat compatibility; Sock-like fit with snug integrated cuff; Synthetic outsole with TPU walking pods; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Beige Tone / Core Black / Beam Yellow; Product code: GX1664

title: 4DFWD 2 Shoes
subtitle: Women's Running
description:
adidas 4DFWD 2 redefines forward motion combining the unique, groundbreaking innovation of a 3D printed midsole with a new upper construction and a Continental outsole for extra grip. With every stride, the adidas 4DFWD 2 midsole compresses forward, reducing braking forces and transforming the impact energy into forward motion. The result is a smooth ride with less stop-and-go pounding on pavement. The Continental outsole grippy rubber outsole provides traction on wet and dry surfaces to keep you going in all conditions, and the adidas PRIMEKNIT+ upper wraps the foot with a new fit that enhances movement.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Unmistakable pink details and graphics tell the awareness story, while a blend of responsive BOOST and ultra-lightweight Lightstrike ensures high-energy return over mountainous terrain and cushions every stride to help you keep your pace over technical trails.​ A Pebax® plate runs the entire length of the shoe for lightweight, durable rock protection over long-distance mountain trails.​

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

The modest flex offers all-day comfort for everything you do.

description:
The Trailcross Clip-In is the latest addition to the Five Ten Trailcross family, designed from the ground up with adventure at its core. Packed with all the Trailcross technology, this latest model provides clip-in performance on the bike and all-day comfort when hiking off the bike. The addition of the Clip-In model takes the range to the next level, making our award-winning design available to clip-in pedal users for the first time.

The Trailcross range was built from the ground up, starting with the Five Ten dotted outsole with the addition of a recessed cleat to clip into compatible pedals. This was then refined with hiking in mind, bringing the additional ridged grip to the toe and heel. The Trailcross Clip-In is a lightweight and breathable shoe. With the need for the shoe to provide all-day comfort but also deliver across the contact points on and off the bike, the mid-sole EVA technology provides the necessary toe flex for hiking, without losing the all-important stiffness. The Trailcross Clip-In utilizes a hook and loop closure for added security and to reduce heel lift. Clip-in pedal users no longer need to compromise when planning their next adventure.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure with hook-and-loop top strap; Textile upper with abrasion-resistant overlays and reflective details; Light and breathable feel; Impact-resistant toe box; Lightweight EVA midsole; Weight 15.3 ounces (size 9); Stealth® Marathon rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Beige Tone / Blue Rush / Orbit Green; Product code: GZ9851
colors: Core Black / Grey Three / Red

description:
The TERREX AGRAVIC ULTRA has been created in close collaboration with one of the world's fastest ultra trail runners, EKATERINA MITYAEVA. It is one of the first trail running shoes from adidas to feature a bio-based thermoplastic elastomer (TPE) plate that's made out of 90% renewable carbon.​

​The TPE bio-based plate runs the entire length of the shoe, sandwiched between the midsole and outsole for lightweight, durable rock protection over long-distance mountain trails.​
Created using renewable carbon sources and using bio-based ingredients.​ 
A blend of responsive Boost and ultra-lightweight Lightstrike works with a TPE plate to ensure high-energy return over mountainous terrain that also cushions every stride to help you keep your pace over technical trails.​
details: Lace closure; Open mesh upper with abrasion-resistant weldings, and padded tongue; Snug midfoot with slightly wider toe box; Lightstrike and Boost midsole with carbon plate layer; Dual-layer Achilles protection and midsole rock protection plate; Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Turbo / Crystal White; Product code: GZ9037

Respect is earned. Damian Lillard made his name by showing up in the moments that matter the most, when everything is on the line. These kids' signature shoes from adidas Basketball and Dame celebrate one of the game's best closers with Dame graphics and a colorful upper inspired by Jack-Jack, the youngest member of the Incredible family from the Disney Pixar film "The Incredibles." The outsole and Bounce Pro midsole are designed specifically for Dame's lethal combination of speed and precision.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g., cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; Cloudfoam midsole; Rubber outsole; ©Disney; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Red / Team Yellow / Impact Orange; Product code: GW9002

description: To bike pack is to explore. When the ride is more about the adventure than the destination, these adidas Five Ten mountain biking shoes fit the bill. Pedal, push and hike in any terrain with comfort, traction and support made for all-day adventure.

description:
"Y-3 is a strong examination of the blend of sport and style and the tension caused by mixing tradition with all that is modern."  — Yohji Yamamoto 

Y-3 builds on the legend of the famed adidas Nizza basketball shoes, using them as inspiration to create the experimental style and completely new look of the Ajatu Court High. Exaggerated tooling creates a more sculpted volume for an elevated take on the timeless silhouette. The woven textile upper is refined with leather details and a zip around the heel that lets you slip into the shoe without unlacing them.
details: Lace and zip closures; Textile and leather upper; Leather and suede lining; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Black / Black / Cream White; Product code: HQ5967
colors: Black / Black / Cream White

description:
Retro sneakers are all that, full stop. But even the best things in life could always use a little refresh. With a modernized shape and on-point details, this classic adidas shoe makes everything from errands to your work outfit that much better. A BOOST midsole puts that spring in your step with soft, supportive comfort. Stitched suede is crisp yet casual, giving you an athletic look that's versatile too. 

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Lace closure; Monomesh upper with stitched suede overlays; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Off White / Vivid Red / Aluminium; Product code: GW6776
colors: Focus Olive / Core White / Beam Orange

description: When you want casual style without sacrificing performance on the course, these adidas golf leather shoes have you covered. BOOST cushioning delivers energy return while a soft heel pad offers comfort with each step to keep you feeling comfortable through your round and beyond. The spikeless flexible outsole provides flexibility and grip on any terrain and transitions easily from course to clubhouse.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Waterproof leather upper; Slow resilient sockliner; BOOST midsole; Spikeless flexible outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Gold Metallic / Blue Rush; Product code: GV9668
